symptom: Railway auto-deploy not pulling new code after git push
Railway auto-deploy not pulling latest code from GitHub - restarts but serves old code
root_cause: GitHub webhook or Railway integration broken - requires dashboard verification
resolution: Manual railway up deployment as workaround - auto-deploy fix pending dashboard checks

symptom: Railway CLI permission error - version.json owned by root, qemu symlink broken
root_cause: Railway CLI run with sudo at some point, created root-owned files in ~/.railway/
resolution: sudo chown damianseguin:staff ~/.railway/version.json && rm broken qemu symlink

symptom: Railway CLI up command hangs during indexing with Permission denied (os error 13)
root_cause: Unknown file permission issue during Railway indexing - version.json fixed but still fails. Qemu symlink broken. Needs dtruss/fs_usage trace to identify exact file.
resolution: UNRESOLVED - Next session: Run sudo dtruss -f railway up --detach to trace permission error. Check for broken symlinks in project. Alternative: Deploy via Railway web dashboard.
